LanguageData.BM_SpacerOrbitalBombardmentAbilityModule: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular model includes a compact storage and deployment apparatus for orbital bombardment targeters. The core functions of the targeter remain the same and it has to be replaced after each use as a result. Due to its small size and low weight, the wielder can carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
